translation.blogSubtitle: Here you will find all my proof of concepts.
translation.responseSuccessOutput: Thank you for your message. It has been sent.
translation.responseFailureOutput: An error has occurred, please try again later.

started.subtitle: Programmer and Mentor
started.description: Hello! I am Software Developer from Argentina with a solid experience of 10 years. I would like to talk to you, so feel free to contact me.

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.subtitle: My Story
aboutMe.firstParagraph: I'm from Argentina and I work as Software Developer since 2014.
aboutMe.secondParagraph: In my free time, apart from playing video games with friends and engaging in some sports like rollerblading and soccer.  I also invest part of time in self-improvement, whether to keep up-to-date with technology or to learn something new. Throughout my professional journey, I have worked for various companies, including public transportation, satellite tracking, and a software factory where I had the opportunity to work with different companies such as Maritime Agents. Currently, I am working for one of the largest insurance companies in the country.

unreal.title: Multiplayer Lobby made in Unreal Engine 5 C++ and Blueprints
unreal.description: The objective of this proof of concept was to create a simple game, which includes a menu, lobby, some example maps, integration with Steam and LAN. I have uploaded images and a video with a brief demo on my GitHub.

myweb.title: Just Another Page
myweb.description: This simple website has 2 very clear objectives, the first is to showcase my story, and the second is to learn a little about React. So, I invite you to check out my Github to gossip ðŸ˜‰.

alpr.title: ALPR with Darknet and YOLOv4-tiny
alpr.description: Automatic number plate recognition (ANPR) with the particularity that it was trained with 7200+ images of Argentine license plates.
